frameDefinitions: An Experiencer has an easy or difficult time carrying out an Activity.
A Dependent state-of-affairs has a Requirement as a prerequisite for obtaining or occurring.

A Factor affects the outcome of an Undertaking, which  can be a goal-oriented activity or the maintenance of a desirable state, the work in a Field, or something portrayed as affecting an Interested_party.
A Cognizer has a relatively fixed positive or negative point of view towards an Issue.
Under some Condition, usually left implicit, a Duty needs to be fulfilled by a  Responsible_party.
frameExamples: The atomic bombings were probably not <t>necessary</t> to win WWII without a mainland invasion of Japan.
Temperature is the most <t>critical</t> factor in successful storage.
In interviews , it seems like everyone is completely <t>against</t> this expenditure .
It would <t>behoove</t> us to comprehend and personalize what Jesus had to tell his disciples
listRoleDefinitions: This Frame Element marks expressions indicating the <fen>Activity</fen> that the <fen>Experiencer</fen> finds difficult or easy. In many cases, the relevant <fen>Activity</fen> has to be inferred from the context.
This Frame Element marks expressions that indicate which person judges carrying out the <fen>Activity</fen> to be easy or difficult.
The time at which the <fen>Activity</fen> takes place.
The state-of-affairs which cannot hold without the <fen>Requirement</fen>.
The entity or state-of-affairs that must be present or obtain in order for the <fen>Dependent</fen> to obtain.
An entity that has to be present for the <fen>Dependent</fen> state of affairs to obtain.
The time at which the <fen>Requirement</fen> is necessary for the <fen>Dependent</fen>.
<fen>Place</fen> denotes a location in which the specified relation between <fen>Requirement</fen> and <fen>Dependent</fen> holds.
<fen>Factor</fen> is used for the concrete or abstract entity whose importance is assessed.
The <fen>Undertaking</fen> is a process or state or field of activity in which the <fen>Interested_party</fen> has a stake.
<fen>Interested_party</fen> identifies the people who are affected by a particular <fen>Factor</fen>.
A <fen>Factor</fen> may be generally important to the people or the activities in a field of endeavour.
The <fen>Time</fen> at which the <fen>Factor</fen> is important to the <fen>Undertaking</fen>.
The location at which the <fen>Factor</fen> is important.
The individual that holds an opinion on an <fen>Issue</fen> or Side.
The matter, usually concerning a course of action, which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> has a positive or negative opinion about.
The party or individual (generally associated with a particular position on an <fen>Issue</fen>) that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> has an opinion about.
An action taken by a <fen>Side</fen> or a view that the <fen>Side</fen> takes on an issue which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> either supports or opposes.
The time period during which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> has the indicated point of view towards the <fen>Issue</fen>.
The location where the <fen>Cognizer</fen> takes <fen>Side</fen>s on an <fen>Issue</fen> .
The action that the <fen>Responsible_party</fen> is obligated to perform.
The person who must perform the <fen>Duty</fen>.
The time interval during which the <fen>Duty</fen> is mandatory.
A location in which the <fen>Duty</fen>  obtains.
listRoleExamples: The geology question on the exam was hard <fex>for me</fex>.
<fex>In the US</fex>, the political clout of big city mayors is necessary to put this on the national agenda.
<fex>Being sure they are buying fresh food</fex> is important to most people.
Temperature is the most critical factor <fex>in successful storage</fex>.
Being sure they are buying fresh food is important <fex>to most people</fex>.
A successful GATT round is important <fex>for the world economy</fex>.
<fex>Last year</fex> she opposed the bill, but changed her mind after she received correspondence supporting the bill.
<fex>Getting a shot against yellow fever</fex> is obligatory for travellers to Benin.
The use of TM software is obligatory <fex>for every freelance translator working on projects for our company</fex>.
<fex>These days</fex>, wearing a seat-belt is mandatory.
Gymnasium is not obligatory <fex>in Sweden</fex>, but nearly everyone attends gymnasium
